description: This file contains functions related to reasoning with a DeepSeek model, including checking if a model is a DeepSeek reasoning model and obtaining reasoning responses asynchronously or synchronously, with logging and message handling.

methods.name: is_deepseek_reasoning_model
methods.description: Checks if the given reasoning model is a DeepSeek model based on class name and id.

methods.name: get_deepseek_reasoning
methods.description: Synchronously obtains a reasoning message from the reasoning agent, updating message roles and handling exceptions.

methods.name: aget_deepseek_reasoning
methods.description: Asynchronously obtains a reasoning message from the reasoning agent, updating message roles and handling exceptions.
